title: 22 21 22 "Recipe for Disaster""The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!"Transliteration: "Saikyō no Kaizoku Kantai! Teitoku Don Kurīku" (Japanese:最強の海賊艦隊!提督ドン·クリーク) Yukio Kaizawa Junki Takegami 812.2 April 26, 2000(2000-04-26)[42] February 19, 2005[43]
transformers_text:
22 21 22 "Recipe for Disaster""The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!"Transliteration: "Saikyō no Kaizoku Kantai! Teitoku Don Kurīku" (Japanese:最強の海賊艦隊!提督ドン·クリーク) Yukio Kaizawa Junki Takegami 812.2 April 26, 2000(2000-04-26)[42] February 19, 2005[43]

Ghin returns to the Baratie with his commodore,Don Krieg, on a nearly-destroyed ship, and begs the cooks to feed him. Sanji feeds him again, despite knowing that he is dangerous. Krieg betrays him and demands a hundred meals for his men, as well as the restaurant ship. The cooks oppose Sanji, but Zeff agrees to prepare the food.
